name: Salamander
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Heated Body: A creature that touches the salamander or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 (2d6) fire damage.
traits.Heated Weapons: Any metal melee weapon the salamander wields deals an extra 3 (1d6) fire damage on a hit (included in the attack).
